author: dain
msg: The class is sun.tools.javac.Main not sun/tools/javac/Main

author: dain
msg: Added hack to install the tools.jar into the system classloader on startup iff the sun javac compiler it unavailable
This is needed so JSP files can compile on most Java VMs since the tools.jar is not normally in the system classpath
